General.Name: Nbond Nonwovens
General.Description: HangZhou Nbond Nonwovens Co., Ltd. engages in the research, develop, production, and sale of spunlace nonwovens materials in China and internationally. It provides beauty materials, industrial materials, civil cleaning, and medical materials products; and non-woven dry towel products, such as cotton soft towels, beauty products, civil cleaning rags, industrial wipes, etc. The company also offers spunlace nonwoven material wet wipes products, which include hygiene products, such as baby wipes, pet wipes, industrial wipes, electronic screen wipes, household wipes, etc.; skin care products including makeup remover wipes, face masks, personal care wipes; and medical daily necessities, such as adult wipes, alcohol wipes, disinfectant wipes, and hand sanitizer. In addition, it provides household cleaning and care products, which include face towels, cotton towels, wet wipes, and other cleaning products. The company was incorporated in 2002 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

5.Name: Mr. Wei Guo  Chen
